verses.verse: My spirit <WH7307> is consumed <WH2254>, my days <WH3117> are extinct <WH2193>, The grave is ready for me <WH6913>.
Surely there are mockers <WH2049> with me <WH5869>, And mine eye dwelleth <WH3885> upon their provocation <WH4784>.
Give <WH7760> now a pledge <WH6148>, be surety for me with thyself <WH8628>; Who is there that will strike hands with me <WH3027>?
For thou hast hid <WH6845> their heart <WH3820> from understanding <WH7922>: Therefore shalt thou not exalt them <WH7311>.
He that denounceth <WH5046> his friends <WH7453> for a prey <WH2506>, Even the eyes <WH5869> of his children <WH1121> shall fail <WH3615>.
But he hath made <WH3322> me a byword <WH4914> of the people <WH5971>; And they <WH6440> spit in my face <WH8611>.
Mine eye <WH5869> also is dim <WH3543> by reason of sorrow <WH3708>, And all my members <WH3338> are as a shadow <WH6738>.
Upright <WH3477> men shall be astonished <WH8074> at this <WH5355>, And the innocent shall stir up <WH5782> himself against the godless <WH2611>.
Yet shall the righteous <WH6662> hold <WH270> on his way <WH1870>, And he that hath clean <WH2890> hands <WH3027> shall wax <WH3254> stronger and stronger <WH555>.
But <WH199> as for you all <WH7725>, come on now <WH935> again <WH4672>; And I shall not find a wise man among you <WH2450>.
My days <WH3117> are past <WH5674>, my purposes <WH2154> are broken off <WH5423>, Even the thoughts <WH4180> of my heart <WH3824>.
They change <WH7760> the night <WH3915> into day <WH3117>: The light <WH216>, say they <WH7138>, is near unto <WH6440> the darkness <WH2822>.
If I look <WH6960> for Sheol <WH7585> as my house <WH1004>; If I have spread <WH7502> my couch <WH3326> in the darkness <WH2822>;
If I have said <WH7121> to corruption <WH7845>, Thou art my father <WH1>; To the worm <WH7415>, Thou art my mother <WH517>, and my sister <WH269>;
Where then is <WH645> my hope <WH8615>? And as for my hope <WH8615>, who shall see it <WH7789>?
It shall go down <WH3381> to the bars <WH905> of Sheol <WH7585>, When once there is rest <WH5183> in <WH3162> the dust <WH6083>.
